thread.title: Richards, Fallon to help induct friends into hall of fame
thread.title_full: Richards, Fallon to help induct friends into hall of fame

title: Richards, Fallon to help induct friends into hall of fame
text:
Keith Richards, Jimmy Fallon to honor Scotty Moore, Timberlake at Memphis Music Hall of Fame THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   14, 2015 - 12:06 pmLast Updated: October 14, 2015 - 12:07 pm   
People: 
Tennessee (480) 

MEMPHIS, Tennessee â€” Rolling Stones' guitarist Keith Richards and "Tonight Show" host Jimmy Fallon will be special guests helping to induct their friends into the Memphis Music Hall of Fame. 
Richards will induct Elvis Presley's guitarist Scotty Moore and Fallon will induct pop star Justin Timberlake during the ceremony on Saturday. 
The 2015 class of inductees also includes Alberta Hunter, Al Jackson Jr., Charlie Rich and Sam & Dave. Previous inductees include Elvis, B.B. King, Al Green, Jerry Lee Lewis and Johnny Cash. 
Performers include Steve Cropper, Tracy Nelson, Melanie Fiona and Charlie Rich Jr. 
Online:
